My heart is broken. My 93 yr old Aunt Yoshi passed away last night at her LTC facility in NY. She tested positive a few days ago but had been asymptomatic. She spent her HS years in internment camp. Had an amazing life, but her 3 kids & 5 grandkids couldn't be w her at the end.💔
